queries.description: Containers should not run with allowPrivilegeEscalation in order to prevent them from gaining more privileges than their parent process

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{default-proxy}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{wait-dns}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false

queries.query_name: Volume Mount With OS Directory Write Permissions
queries.description: Containers can mount sensitive folders from the hosts, giving them potentially dangerous access to critical host configurations and binaries.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{default-proxy}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{default-proxy}}.volumeMounts.name={{join-token}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{default-plugin-registry}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{default-plugin-registry}}.volumeMounts.name={{default-plugin-registry-data}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{default-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{default-controller}}.volumeMounts.name={{sockets}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{default-plugin-registry}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{default-plugin-registry}}.volumeMounts.name={{plugin-data}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{default-controller}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{chown}}.volumeMounts.name={{data}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{default-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{default-controller}}.volumeMounts.name={{data}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{default-plugin-registry}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{default-plugin-registry}}.volumeMounts.name={{join-token}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{default-proxy}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{chown}}.volumeMounts.name={{default-proxy-data}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{default-plugin-registry}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{chown}}.volumeMounts.name={{plugin-data}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{default-plugin-registry}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{chown}}.volumeMounts.name={{default-plugin-registry-data}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{default-proxy}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{default-proxy}}.volumeMounts.name={{default-proxy-data}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{default-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{default-controller}}.volumeMounts.name={{staticconfig}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true

queries.description: Containers should only run as non-root user. This limits the exploitability of security misconfigurations and restricts an attacker's possibilities in case of compromise

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{default-controller}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{wait-dns}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{default-proxy}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{chown}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{default-controller}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{chown}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{default-plugin-registry}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{chown}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true

queries.description: Check if containers are running with low UID, which might cause conflicts with the host's user table.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{default-proxy}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{chown}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be set to a UID >= 10000
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{default-proxy}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{chown}}.securityContext.runAsUser is set to a low UID

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{default-controller}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{wait-dns}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be set to a UID >= 10000
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{default-controller}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{wait-dns}}.securityContext.runAsUser is set to a low UID

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{default-controller}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{chown}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be set to a UID >= 10000
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{default-controller}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{chown}}.securityContext.runAsUser is set to a low UID

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{default-plugin-registry}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{chown}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be set to a UID >= 10000
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{default-plugin-registry}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{chown}}.securityContext.runAsUser is set to a low UID

queries.query_name: RBAC Roles with Read Secrets Permissions
queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles with get/watch/list RBAC permissions on Kubernetes secrets are dangerous and should be avoided. In case of compromise, attackers could abuse these roles to access sensitive data, such as passwords, tokens and keys

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{default-svc-acc-role}}.rules[2] should not be granted read access to Secrets objects
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{default-svc-acc-role}}.rules[2] is granted read access (verbs: create, update, get, list, watch) to Secrets objects

queries.query_name: Service Account Token Automount Not Disabled
queries.description: Service Account Tokens are automatically mounted even if not necessary

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{default-controller}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false

queries.description: Service has an external load balancer, which may cause accessibility from other networks and the Internet

files.expected_value: 'metadata.annotations' should be set

queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles when binded, should not use get, list or watch as verbs

files.expected_value: The metadata.name={{default-svc-acc-role}}.rules.verbs should not contain the following verbs: [["create", "update", "get", "list", "watch"]]

files.expected_value: metadata.name=default-proxy is targeted by a PodDisruptionBudget
files.actual_value: metadata.name=default-proxy is not targeted by a PodDisruptionBudget
